properties.name: dynamic.module.includes
properties.description: 动态路由包含的请求模块对应的数据库映射类集合，支持'*'通配.

properties.name: dynamic.module.excludes
properties.description: 动态路由排除的请求模块对应的数据库映射类集合，支持'*'通配.

properties.name: dynamic.module.defaultPrefixPath
properties.description: 默认的基础包路径(以“/”分割)，默认为动态模块启用注解{@link EnableDynamicModules}入口类所在的包路径.

properties.name: dynamic.module.defaultPersistence
properties.description: 默认生效的持久化类型.

properties.name: dynamic.module.defaultComponents
properties.description: 默认生效的组件类型集合.

properties.name: dynamic.module.preferences.order
properties.description: 排序值，数字越大优先级越高.

properties.name: dynamic.module.preferences.path
properties.description: 声明所在包路径(以“/”分割).

properties.name: dynamic.module.preferences.registrarPath
properties.description: spring bean注册器类的全路径.

properties.name: dynamic.module.preferences.customizes
properties.description: 自定义属性配置，用于支持埋点.
